com.hazelcast.spi.impl

Interface AllowedDuringPassiveState

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    JoinOperation, MigrationCycleOperation, ReadonlyOperation
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AuthenticationFailureOperation, AuthorizationOperation, AwaitMapFlushOperation, BeforeJoinCheckFailureOperation, CacheContainsKeyOperation, CacheEntryIteratorOperation, CacheGetAllOperation, CacheGetConfigOperation, CacheGetOperation, CacheKeyIteratorOperation, CacheSizeOperation, ChangeClusterStateOperation, CheckReplicaVersion, ClientReAuthOperation, ConfigMismatchOperation, ContainsKeyOperation, ContainsValueOperation, CreateAllowedDuringPassiveStateTxBackupLogOperation, DeregistrationOperation, FetchPartitionStateOperation, FinalizeJoinOperation, FinalizeMigrationOperation, GetAllOperation, GetConnectedClientsOperation, GetEntryViewOperation, GetOperation, GetOperation, GetOperation, GetOperation, GroupMismatchOperation, HasOngoingMigration, HeartbeatOperation, JoinCheckOperation, JoinRequestOperation, LockClusterStateOperation, MapFetchEntriesOperation, MapFetchKeysOperation, MapIsEmptyOperation, MapSizeOperation, MasterClaimOperation, MasterConfirmationOperation, MasterDiscoveryOperation, MemberAttributeChangedOperation, MemberInfoUpdateOperation, MemberRemoveOperation, MergeClustersOperation, MigrationCommitOperation, MigrationOperation, MigrationRequestOperation, NotifyMapFlushOperation, PartitionCheckIfLoadedOperation, PartitionStateOperation, PostJoinOperation, PromotionCommitOperation, PurgeAllowedDuringPassiveStateTxBackupLogOperation, QueryOperation, QueryPartitionOperation, ReadonlyKeyBasedMapOperation, RegistrationOperation, ReplicaSyncRequest, ReplicaSyncResponse, ReplicaSyncRetryResponse, ReplicateAllowedDuringPassiveStateTxBackupLogOperation, RollbackAllowedDuringPassiveStateTxBackupLogOperation, RollbackClusterStateOperation, SafeStateCheckOperation, SendEventOperation, SetMasterOperation, ShutdownNodeOperation, ShutdownRequestOperation, ShutdownResponseOperation, TriggerMemberListPublishOperation

    public interface AllowedDuringPassiveState
    Marker interface for operations those are allowed to be executed or invoked during Node's NodeState.PASSIVE state.

    By default, only join, replication and cluster heartbeat operations are allowed during shutdown.

    Since:
    3.6
    See Also:
    NodeState
